posts.post_content:
Shipping is included and will be via USPS Registered.  It's a little slow, but very secure and we will be covered by my insurance policy.  I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.  Price assumes a no-fee payment method, but I am fine with PP Goods.  Just add 3%.

Pretty incredible card for the grade in my opinion.  Just a few wrinkles and corner wear.

Not exactly sure how to price this one.  A couple 1.5s with tough backs have sold lately.  A Sov150 PSA 1.5 went for $4550.  That was a nice card, but eye appeal not quite at the level of this one.  And a PSA 1.5 EPDG went for $3035.  The back of that one had some issues.  Obviously Hindu is quite a step up from either of those backs.  I think about double the Sov150 is about right, but feel free to send me offers.  As always "SOLD" or "I'll take it" takes precedence over any outstanding offers.

This scan looks a lot bigger if you open it in Paint so feel free to shoot me an email if you'd like me to send it to you.

$8900 obo

Please email me a couple additional pics. 
Thx, [url]dan@chiprop.com[/url]
